description: Works to trees covered by LBE ORDER NO 14 (2) 1969- 1x Horse Chestnut: crown reduce by up to 2.5m max. to appropriate pruning points, retaining suitable leaf-bearing structure throughout; 3 x Lime & 3 x Horse Chestnut: reduce lateral branches on the western side by up to 2.5m max. to appropriate pruning points, retaining suitable leaf-bearing structure throughout, and crown lift to provide 3m clearance between the driveway and remaining foliage, and 1m clearance between the garage roof and the remaining foliage.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
